node.text:
Round up your friends and work up an appetite to feast on yummy eggs Benedict and French toast and allow the binge to wash away lingering stresses of the week. Let the weekend vibe sink in with the Sunday Brunch Extravaganza at The Raviz Kovalam. 
For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
